getServer: get a server with a correct id and all data that the model can store
get a server with invalid id
get a server with an id that do not exist in db
createServer: create a server with required data
save a server with an avatar that exist
save a server with an avatar that dont exist

updateServer.0: save a server and append a new textChannel
updateServer.2: save a server and add a new command
updateServer.3: save a server and remove a command
updateServer.4: save a server and append a new moderator
updateServer.5: save a server and remove a moderator
updateServer.6: save a server and append a new member
updateServer.7: save a server and remove a member
updateServer.8: save a server and try to remove a command do not exist
updateServer.9: save a server and try to remove a textChannel do not exist
updateServer.10: save a server and try to remove a moderator do not exist
updateServer.11: save a server and try to remove a member do not exist
updateServer.12: save a server and try to remove a moderator that do exist but is not server moderator
updateServer.13: save a server and try to remove a member that do exist but is not member of the server
updateServer.14: try to remove a command when there are no commands in server
updateServer.15: try to remove a textChannel when there are no commands in server
updateServer.16: try to remove a member when there are no commands in server
updateServer.17: try to remove a moderator when there are no commands in server

deleteServer: delete a server that do not exist
delete a server passing an invalid id
all: try to make the operation sending invalid structured data
